# HMCharacteristicValueWiFiSatelliteStatus.connected

**Case**

The WiFi satellite accessory is connected.

## Declaration

```swift
case connected
```

## Network states

- **HMCharacteristicValueWiFiSatelliteStatus.notConnected**: The WiFi satellite accessory isn’t connected.
- **HMCharacteristicValueWiFiSatelliteStatus.unknown**: The WiFi satellite accessory status is unknown.

items.description: The WiFi satellite accessory isn’t connected.
